mapper.select: SELECT ft.parent_id AS id, parentInfo.img_url, ft.eng_name, ft.name_ FROM flcx_type ft RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT fct.type_id, fct.img_url FROM flcx_city_type fct WHERE fct.del_flag = 0 AND fct.area_id IN ( SELECT id AS id FROM flcx_city WHERE city_name = #{cityName} UNION SELECT #{cityId} AS id ) GROUP BY fct.parent_id ) parentInfo ON parentInfo.type_id = ft.id WHERE ft.del_flag = 0 AND ft.img_url IS NOT NULL AND ft.img_url != '' ORDER BY ft.sort_ ASC;
